Content:: Triple Crown Records is a New York-based rock music record label created in 1997 by Fred Feldman.[2][3][4] The label features such artists as The Receiving End of Sirens and The Dear Hunter,[5] and launched the career of Brand New in 2001.[6] It is a part of the Eastwest family of record labels, a subsidiary of Warner Music Group, and is distributed by the Alternative Distribution Alliance.[7]
Title: Triple Crown Records - Wikipedia
